dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Cora dataset contains 2,708 scientific publications divided into 7 categories. Each publication is described by a binary bag-of-word representation, where 0 indicates the absence of a word from the dictionary, and 1 indicates its presence.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Citeseer dataset consists of 3,327 scientific publications divided into 6 categories. Each publication is described by a binary bag-of-word representation, where 0 indicates the absence of a word from the dictionary, and 1 indicates its presence.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: The Pubmed dataset is comprised of 19,717 scientific publications divided into 3 classes. Each publication is described by a vectorial representation using Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency (TF-IDF), drawn from a dictionary with 500 terms.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:description: The 20-newsgroup dataset consists of 16,242 articles divided into 4 groups, with binary occurrence values for 100 words, making it suitable for the use of a hypergraph.
dcterms:title: 20-newsgroup
